org.springframework.beans.factory.support
Class BeanFactoryUtils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanFactoryUtils
public abstract class BeanFactoryUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience methods operating on bean factories. Use to get a collection of beans of a given type (rather than bean names), and for methods that return bean instances, names or counts taking into account the hierarchy a bean factory may participate in.

Since:
04-Jul-2003
Version:
$Id: BeanFactoryUtils.java,v 1.1.1.1 2003/08/14 16:20:19 trisberg Exp $
Author:
Rod Johnson

Method Detail

beansOfType

public static java.util.List beansOfType(java.lang.Class type,
                                         ListableBeanFactory lbf)
Return all beans of the given type or subtypes. Useful convenience method when we don't care about bean names.
Parameters:
type - type of bean to match. The return list will contain only this type
lbf -  
Returns:
List return the empty list if there are no beans of this type

beansOfTypeIncludingAncestors

public static java.util.List beansOfTypeIncludingAncestors(java.lang.Class type,
                                                           ListableBeanFactory lbf)
Like beansOfType() but also picks up beans defined in ancestor bean factories if the current bean factory is a HierarchicalBeanFactory
Parameters:
type - type of bean to match
lbf -  
Returns:
List

countBeansIncludingAncestors

public static int countBeansIncludingAncestors(ListableBeanFactory lbf)
Count all bean definitions in any hierarchy in which this factory participates. Includes counts of ancestor bean factories. Beans that are "overridden" (specified in a descendant factory with the same name) are counted only once.
Parameters:
lbf -  
Returns:
int count of beans including those defined in ancestor factories

beanNamesIncludingAncestors

public static java.util.Collection beanNamesIncludingAncestors(ListableBeanFactory lbf)
Return all bean names in the factory, including ancestor factories.
Parameters:
lbf -  
Returns:
Collection

beanNamesIncludingAncestors

public static java.util.Collection beanNamesIncludingAncestors(java.lang.Class type,
                                                               ListableBeanFactory lbf)
Get all bean names including those defined in ancestor factories for the given type
Parameters:
type - type beans must match
lbf - ListableBeanFactory. If this isn't also a HierarchicalBeanFactory, this method will return the same as it's own getBeanDefinitionNames() method.
Returns:
Collection
